story.text: Jan 2 Presstek Inc. PRST.O said it discontinued operations of Precision Analog plate business and would take a related one-time charge of $7.14 million in the fourth quarter of 2006. The digital imaging solutions provider expects a negligible negative impact on earnings in 2007 as a result of discontinuing the operations, it said in a statement. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: presstek discontinues precision analog plate business
